#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

struct data {
	data * list[52];
	int count[52];
} *root;

int maxlength;

data * create_new_node() {
	data * newnode = new data;
	for(int index=0; index<52; index++) {
		newnode->list[index]=NULL;
		newnode->count[index]=0;
	}
	return newnode;
}

void delete_structure(data * current) {
	for(int index=0; index<52; index++) {
		if(current->list[index]!=NULL) {
			delete_structure(current->list[index]);
		}
	}
	delete current;
}

void insert_name(char * name) {
	data * current=root;
	for(int index=0; name[index]!='\0'; index++) {
		int offset;
		if(islower(name[index])) {
			offset=name[index]-'a';
		} else {
			offset=name[index]-'A'+26;
		}
		if(current->list[offset]!=NULL) {
			current->count[offset]++;
			if(current->count[offset]>1) {
				if(maxlength<index+1) {
					maxlength=index+1;
				}
			}
			current=current->list[offset];
		} else {
			current->list[offset]=create_new_node();
			current->count[offset]++;
			current=current->list[offset];
		}
	}
}

int main() {
	maxlength=0;
	root=create_new_node();
	int T;
	//cin >> T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	//cin.get();
	char name[110];
	while(T) {
		scanf("%s", name);
		//cout << name << endl;
		insert_name(name);
		T--;
	}
	printf("%d\n", maxlength);
	//delete_structure(root);
	return 0;
}
